sides.title: BT-1
sides.ability: While you perform an attack, you may change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result for each stress token the defender has.

sides.title: Bistan
sides.ability: After you perform a primary attack, if you are focused, you may perform a bonus [Turret] attack against a shipe you have not already attacked this round.

sides.title: Bossk
sides.ability: After you perform a primary attack that misses, if you are not stressedm you must receive 1 stress token to perform a bonus primary attack against the same target.

sides.title: Dengar
sides.ability: After you defend, if the attacker is in your firing arc, you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, roll 1 attack die unless the attacker chooses to remove 1 green token. On a [Hit] or [Critical Hit] result, the attacker suffers 1 [Hit] damage.

sides.title: Ezra Bridger
sides.ability: After you perform a primary attack, you may spend 1 [Force] to perform a bonus [Turret] attack from a [Turret] you have not attacked from this round. If you do and you are stressed, you may reroll 1 attack die.

sides.title: Fifth Brother
sides.ability: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 [Force] to change 1 of your [Focus] results to a [Critical Hit] result.

sides.title: Greedo
sides.ability: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 [Charge] to change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result. While you defend, if your [Charge] is active, the attacker may change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result.

sides.title: Han Solo
sides.ability: During the Engagement Phase, at initiative 7, you may perform a [Turret] attack. You cannot attack from that [Turret] again this round.

sides.title: Hotshot Gunner
sides.ability: While you perform a [Turret] attack, after the Modify Defense Dice step, the defender removes 1 focus or calculate token.

sides.title: Luke Skywalker
sides.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1 [Force] to rotate your [Turret] indicator.

sides.title: Skilled Bombardier
sides.ability: If you would drop or launch a device, you may use a template of the same bearing with a speed 1 higher or lower.

sides.title: Veteran Tail Gunner
sides.ability: After you perform a primary [Front Arc] attack, you may perform a bonus primary [Rear Arc] attack.

sides.title: Veteran Turret Gunner
sides.ability: After you perform a primary attack, you may perform a bonus [Turret] attack using a [Turret] you did not already attack from this round.
